summary: Sets what in my opinion is an immersive color set that allows the player to have a better feel of what it would be like to see through the eyes of a vampire under the affects of the (curse)/(disease). In a different way then seen before on Skyrim. (well to my knowledge)
descriptionHtml:
[center]Funny story about this is that I was just messing around with the enb settings then decided I was done and copied the normal files back over on top of my files or at least that's what I meant to do yet somehow ended up with this anyhow here you are. Not sure I've seen anything like this yet the color change occurs at about 7am to less colors
and 7pm to the normal colored sight 

::REQUIREMENTS::

• Skyrim Latest Version

• Enb Series 3.19 Prefered - http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html

::FEATURES::

• An Almost Colorless Day
• A Colored And Lit Night

::RECOMMENDED MODS::

- Skyrim HD 2k - https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/607?
- Climates Of Tamriel - https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802?
- Viscous Foliage - https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/13686?

These are not necessary, but I use them so it will make a difference in the look. 
there are many more but I didn't plan on spending so much time typing this up.
Also First Thing I've Uploaded To Nexus So There's Always That

::  KNOWN ISSUES ::
• When Waiting A Glipse Of Color Is Seen During The Day Nothing Really Noticeable To Most
** Interiors Remain As The Day Looks Even During Night This Is Not Intended **
::CREDITS::
♦ Fantasy Preset - https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/91324?
♦ Me[/center]
author: Undeadmetal
